basics.name: Conor Mongan
basics.summary: Platform Engineer with 2+ years of enterprise experience at Microsoft and Datadog, specializing in cloud automation, identity integration, and DevOps solutions. Built enterprise-grade Azure infrastructure, automated CI/CD processes, and SAML SSO integrations.

highlights: Engineer critical infrastructure and automation for Microsoft's Engineering Tools and Services Team (E5365), supporting build, test, and deployment pipelines across multiple platforms.
Built Azure DevOps automation tools including build failure correlation systems and automated reporting solutions using Azure Functions and REST APIs.
Maintain 99%+ SLA compliance through proactive monitoring, automated alerting, and rapid incident response across enterprise-scale infrastructure.
Reduced manual operational overhead by 40% through intelligent automation of service deployments and troubleshooting workflows.
Specialized in Datadog's RUM, Synthetics, and APM products, providing advanced technical support for enterprise observability solutions.
Developed internal troubleshooting guides and documentation, improving team efficiency and knowledge sharing.
Collaborated with engineering teams to improve product features based on customer feedback and usage patterns.
Provided first-line technical support for Datadog's monitoring and observability platform serving enterprise customers.
Collaborated with product engineering teams to relay customer feedback, contributing to 3 feature improvements.
Resolved complex integration issues for customers deploying monitoring solutions across multi-cloud environments.

projects.name: Enterprise Bitwarden Integration with Azure AD
projects.description: Built automated enterprise identity integration with Azure AD SAML SSO, Docker containerization, and infrastructure-as-code deployment. Reduced customer setup time by 90% through complete automation of complex enterprise security workflows.

projects.name: Automated Build Status Reporter
projects.description: Created Azure Functions automation that processes Azure DevOps pipeline data and delivers formatted status reports to Microsoft Teams, eliminating daily manual monitoring tasks.

projects.name: Qualife Wellness Tracker
projects.description: Developed Flutter mobile app with Datadog RUM integration for real-time user analytics and wellness tracking using Firestore and API integrations.
